T02D1302:205b-1: shr'i he badzra n'a ma s'a dha no pi ka / bod skad du /
T02D1302:205b-2: dpal kye'i rdo rje'i sgrub pa'i thabs kyi man ngag
T02D1302:205b-3: /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo
T02D1302:205b-4: // shes rab thabs dag bdag nyid can //
T02D1302:205b-5: kye rdor bdag med ma la yang //
T02D1302:205b-6: bla mar bcas la phyag 'tshal nas //
T02D1302:205b-7: rim pa gsum pa'i sgrub thabs brtsam //
T02D1302:205b-8: mi nyid rnyed dka' de bas kyang //
T02D1302:205b-9: bla ma dga' bsten rnyed par dka' //
T02D1302:205b-10: bdag gzhan don 'byung sngags kyi tshul //
T02D1302:205b-11: 'gro phan lam la brten par gyis //
T02D1302:205b-12: yon tan ldan zhing brtson par ldan //
T02D1302:205b-13: bla mar gus shing dad ldan pa //
T02D1302:205b-14: rgyal ba'i chos la the tshom med //
T02D1302:205b-15: dbang dang dbye ba nges tshig las //
T02D1302:205b-16: snod yin phyir na drin sbyin bya //
T02D1302:205b-17: chu sogs bum pa'i dbang bskur dang //
T02D1302:205b-18: rim bzhin gsang ba'i dbang bskur dang //
T02D1302:205b-19: shes rab ye shes dbang bskur la //
T02D1302:205b-20: de srid bla ma'i man ngag mtha' //
T02D1302:205b-21: yid du 'ong ba'i sa phyogs su //
T02D1302:205b-22: ri dang nags tshal dang ni phug / chu 'gram bzhi mdo mtsho dang ni //
T02D1302:205b-23: shing gcig dben pa dur khrod rnams //
T02D1302:205b-24: bsam gtan khang pa byas nas ni //
T02D1302:205b-25: bdud rtsi sogs kyis byug par bya //
T02D1302:205b-26: bris sku sogs mchod dgram byas la //
T02D1302:205b-27: nang par sdang [*sngar?] langs sems bdag nyid //
T02D1302:205b-28: phyi rol khrus sogs kun byas la //
T02D1302:205b-29: bde ba'i stan la nyer 'dug ste //
T02D1302:205b-30: sbyong byed dag pa la sogs kyis //
T02D1302:205b-31: 'dod pa'i lha ni bsgrub par bya //
T02D1302:205b-32: bla ma rdo rje can bsams nas //
T02D1302:205b-33: sems kyi rin chen las byung ba'i //
T02D1302:205b-34: mchod pa'i sprin ni spros byas la //
T02D1302:205b-35: de nas rim bzhin dbul bar bya //
T02D1302:205b-36: de nas lha mo brgyad kyis mchod //
T02D1302:205b-37: goo r'i byang chub sems kyis mchod //
T02D1302:205b-38: tsoo r'i rang byung me tog gis //
T02D1302:205b-40: snang mdzad kyis mchod ghasma r'i //
T02D1302:205b-41: pukka s'i yis lcags kyus mchod //
T02D1302:205b-42: s'a ba r'i ni ro 'dzin te //
T02D1302:206a-2: sangs rgyas chos dang tshogs mchog la //
T02D1302:206a-3: byang chub bar du skyabs su mchi //
T02D1302:206a-4: kye rdor shes rab bdag nyid can //
T02D1302:206a-5: slob dpon la ni skyabs su mchi //
T02D1302:206a-6: sdig pa bdag gis gang byas pa //
T02D1302:206a-7: bdag gzhan don du ma lus par //
T02D1302:206a-8: so sor bshags shing slar yang ni //
T02D1302:206a-9: mi bgyid pa yi sdom pa nod //
T02D1302:206a-10: bde gshegs kun gyi bsod nams dang //
T02D1302:206a-11: byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang ni //
T02D1302:206a-12: 'gro ba kun gyi bsod nams la //
T02D1302:206a-13: yang dag nyid du yi rang ngo //
T02D1302:206a-14: phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas la //
T02D1302:206a-15: bdag gis de la bskul ba ni //
T02D1302:206a-16: sems can sdug bsngal mun 'thoms la //
T02D1302:206a-17: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul //
T02D1302:206a-18: sems can sangs rgyas thob bar du //
T02D1302:206a-19: rgyal ba de nyid bzhugs nas ni //
T02D1302:206a-20: nam yang mya ngan mi 'da' bar //
T02D1302:206a-21: thal mo sbyar nas gsol bar 'tshal //
T02D1302:206a-22: stong nyid snying rje dbyer med la //
T02D1302:206a-23: byang chub lam ni ston pa po //
T02D1302:206a-24: bsod nams kun gyi 'byung gnas che //
T02D1302:206a-25: byang chub rnams kyang de bzhin bskyed //
T02D1302:206a-26: lus ngag yid kyi bsod nams ni //
T02D1302:206a-27: bgyis sam bgyid du stsal ba dang //
T02D1302:206a-28: rjes su yi rang gang ci'ang rung //
T02D1302:206a-29: des na 'jig rten kun mkhyen shog / snying rje rlan gyis brlan sems kyis //
T02D1302:206a-30: tshangs pa yi ni gnas bzhi ni //
T02D1302:206a-31: dang po byams pa bsgom par bya //
T02D1302:206a-32: gnyis par snying rje rnam par bsgom //
T02D1302:206a-33: gsum par dga' ba bsgom par bya //
T02D1302:206a-34: kun gyi mtha' nas btang snyoms so //
T02D1302:206a-35: dngos rnams bdag la bsdu bar bya //
T02D1302:206a-36: bdag kyang ye shes sems dpa'o //
T02D1302:206a-37: ye shes sems dpa' n'a da'i bar //
T02D1302:206a-38: de nyid smig rgyu sgyu mar mtshungs //
T02D1302:206a-39: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1302:206a-40: aom a'a ni mi ta dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1302:206a-41: aom aa pra ni hi ta dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1302:206a-42: de nas skye ba med pa'i rang bzhin las //
T02D1302:206a-43: skye ba nyid du mos par bya'o //
T02D1302:206a-44: kam las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du h'um
T02D1302:206a-45: las sna tshogs rdo rje sa bon dang ldan pa
T02D1302:206a-46: de las 'od zer 'phros pas phyogs bcu'i bdud rnams
T02D1302:206a-47: btul nas / dra ba dang ra ba dang sa gzhir gyur par bsam par bya'o //
T02D1302:206a-48: de'i dbus su chos kyi 'byung gnas gru gsum pa dkar po bsams la /
T02D1302:206a-49: de'i steng du pam las sna tshogs padma /
T02D1302:206b-0: kham las sna tshogs @206b rdo rje /
T02D1302:206b-1: de'i steng du lam las sa'i dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa ljang gu /
T02D1302:206b-2: der bam las chu'i dkyil 'khor zlum po dkar po /
T02D1302:206b-3: de las ram las me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum dmar po /
T02D1302:206b-4: der yam las rlung gi dkyil 'khor gzhu'i dbyibs 'dra ba nag po /
T02D1302:206b-5: de la thig le dang ldan par bsams nas /
T02D1302:206b-6: de rnams gcig tu gyur pas /
T02D1302:206b-7: gzhal yas khang gru bzhi sgo bzhi pa /
T02D1302:206b-10: dra ba dang dra ba phyed pa dang /
T02D1302:206b-11: rin po che dang 'dod pa'i yon tan la sogs pas spras pa /
T02D1302:206b-12: de'i dbus su padma 'dab brgyad pa /
T02D1302:206b-13: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor der srog song ba dang bcas pas sems las grub par bsam par bya'o //
T02D1302:206b-14: de'i lte bar a'a li las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor me long lta bu'i ye shes /
T02D1302:206b-15: der k'a li las mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes /
T02D1302:206b-16: de'i dbus su h'um dang aam las rdo rje dang /
T02D1302:206b-17: gri gug sa bon gyis mtshan pa so sor kun du rtog pa'i ye shes /
T02D1302:206b-18: thams cad gcig tu gyur pa bya ba nan tan grub pa'i ye shes /
T02D1302:206b-19: sku rdzogs pa chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes te /
T02D1302:206b-20: sku mdog sngon po zhal gcig phyag gnyis kyis rdo
T02D1302:206b-21: rje dang thod pa bsnams pas shes rab ma la
T02D1302:206b-22: 'khyud pa / phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pa spyan gsum pa dbu la thod pa lngas brgyan cing /
T02D1302:206b-23: sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa dbu skra kham pa gyen du brdzes pa /
T02D1302:206b-24: thod pa rlon pa lnga bcu rtsa bzhis do shal byas pa /
T02D1302:206b-25: gcer bu g-yas brkyang bas bzhugs par bsam par bya'o //
T02D1302:206b-26: bdag med ma ni gri gug dang thod pa bsnams shing sku la 'khyud pa /
T02D1302:206b-27: skyes pa'i thod pas do shal byas shing g-yon brkyang bas bzhugs par bsam par bya ste /
T02D1302:206b-29: nang du yang de bzhin du bsam par bya'o //
T02D1302:206b-30: mig la gti mug rdo rje /
T02D1302:206b-31: rna ba la zhe sdang rdo rje /
T02D1302:206b-32: sna la ser sna rdo rje /
T02D1302:206b-34: lus la phrag dog rdo rje /
T02D1302:206b-35: yid la bdag med ma bsam par bya'o //
T02D1302:206b-36: de nas rang gi snying ga'i sa bon las 'od zer nag po lcags kyu'i dbyibs can spros te /
T02D1302:206b-37: rang bzhin gyi gnas nas ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs la /
T02D1302:206b-38: mchod yon la sogs pas mchod nas /
T02D1302:206b-39: dam tshig gi 'khor lo la bcug ste gnyis su med par bsam par bya'o //
T02D1302:207a-0: yang 'od zer des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad he ru @207a * //
T02D1302:207a-1: ka'i gzugs kyis spyan drangs nas /
T02D1302:207a-2: de la mchod pa la sogs pa bya ste /
T02D1302:207a-3: bdag la byang chub kyi sems kyis dbang bskur nas /
T02D1302:207a-4: mi bskyod pas dbu brgyan par bsam par bya ste /
T02D1302:207a-5: ji srid du mi skyo'i bar du rnal 'byor du bya'o //
T02D1302:207a-7: rig ma'i snying gar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor de'i dbus
T02D1302:207a-8: su gri gug sa bon dang bcas par bsams la
T02D1302:207a-9: / de la sngags kyi phreng ba kun da 'dra
T02D1302:207a-10: ba 'od zer dang ldan pa byung nas rang gi
T02D1302:207a-12: gsang ba'i rdo rjer byung nas /
T02D1302:207a-14: lha mo'i zhal nas rang gi zhal du zhugs par bsam par bya'o //
T02D1302:207a-15: de bzhin du yang nas yang du bsam par bya'o //
T02D1302:207a-16: aom de ba pi tsu badzra h'um h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1302:207a-17: yang na bla ma'i man ngag gis gsang ba'i rdo rje dang padmar bzlas pa bya'o //
T02D1302:207a-18: brtag pa bcu drug pa las /
T02D1302:207a-19: ma phug pas ni sbyor bral 'gyur //
T02D1302:207a-20: phug pas dga' ba sbyin pa'o //
T02D1302:207a-22: yon tan lnga ldan rin chen nyid //
T02D1302:207a-24: de nas yang rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor bshad par bya ste /
T02D1302:207a-25: lte bar sprul pa'i 'khor lo 'dab ma bcu drug
T02D1302:207a-26: pa dkar po'i dbus su rang rig pa'i bdag nyid
T02D1302:207a-27: rin po che'i za ma tog gi nang na gnas
T02D1302:207a-28: par bsam mo // snying ga'i chos kyi 'khor lo
T02D1302:207a-29: 'dab ma bcu drug pa thig le dang ldan pa
T02D1302:207a-30: par bsam mo // / mgrin par longs spyod kyi 'khor lo 'dab ma bcu drug pa dkar po /
T02D1302:207a-31: byang chub kyi sems dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1302:207a-32: mgo bor bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo 'dab ma
T02D1302:207a-33: bcu drug pa dkar po de'i dbus su lhag pa'i
T02D1302:207a-34: byang chub kyi sems 'od dang ldan par bsam par
T02D1302:207a-35: byas nas / sprul pa'i 'khor lo las 'od zer
T02D1302:207a-36: 'phros nas chos kyi 'khor lo dang longs spyod kyi
T02D1302:207a-38: bde ba chen po la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas /
T02D1302:207a-40: sems can thams cad sbyangs nas bde bar gshegs pa'i
T02D1302:207a-41: thugs kar zhugs te ye shes kyi bdud rtsi drangs
T02D1302:207a-42: nas / tshangs pa'i sgor zhugs te gzung 'dzin dang bral nas /
T02D1302:207a-43: za ma tog tu babs par bsam pa ste /
T02D1302:207a-44: de la rtse gcig tu bya'o //
T02D1302:207a-45: mi gsal na yang de bzhin du bya'o //
T02D1302:207a-46: yang na bdag med ma rang gi snying gar bsdu /
T02D1302:207b-0: de yang thig le 'od dang ldan par bsam @207b par bya ste /
T02D1302:207b-1: gsang sngags dam pa thig le'i gzugs su ni //
T02D1302:207b-2: rang yid 'od dang ldan par yongs su bsgom //
T02D1302:207b-3: dngos kun bdag nyid rang gi sems ngo bo /
T02D1302:207b-4: ldang ba na yang bdag dang gzhan 'khor lo 'am /
T02D1302:207b-6: mchod pa la sogs pa yang mi bya'o //
T02D1302:207b-8: phyag rgya bcing ba rnam par spangs //
T02D1302:207b-9: mchod rten las ni mi bya zhing //
T02D1302:207b-10: rdo rje gsum mchog phyag mi 'tshal //
T02D1302:207b-11: dkyil 'khor la sogs lus kyi las //
T02D1302:207b-12: rmi lam du yang mi bya'o //
T02D1302:207b-14: mchod rten brtsig par mi bya ste //
T02D1302:207b-15: de bzhin mchod sogs mi bya'o //
T02D1302:207b-16: gtsug lag dag ni rnyed sla ste //
T02D1302:207b-17: de yi dgos pa rnyed par dka' //
T02D1302:207b-18: zhes gdan bzhi pa las gsungs so //
T02D1302:207b-19: de nas yang lhan cig skyes pa'i rnal 'byor bshad par bya'o //
T02D1302:207b-20: gang tshe ye shes rlung gis ni //
T02D1302:207b-21: rang rig dag ni bskyod nas su //
T02D1302:207b-22: sangs rgyas rnams ni bsregs pa yis //
T02D1302:207b-23: dga' ba la sogs rim bzhin skye //
T02D1302:207b-24: ci 'dra ba ni skye zhe na //
T02D1302:207b-25: gzhon nu'i dga' ba ji lta ba //
T02D1302:207b-26: lkugs pa'i dga' ba ji lta ba'o //
T02D1302:207b-27: gnyis med ye shes skye bar 'gyur //
T02D1302:207b-28: thog ma tha ma dbus med cing //
T02D1302:207b-30: bdag nyid gzhan nyid yod ma yin //
T02D1302:207b-31: 'di ni mchog tu bde ba yin //
T02D1302:207b-32: bdag med ye shes nyid du 'gyur //
T02D1302:207b-33: bdag gzhan nges par rig pa spangs //
T02D1302:207b-34: mkha' mnyam skyon bral lhan cig skyes //
T02D1302:207b-35: thams cad lus la rang bzhin gnas //
T02D1302:207b-36: dga' ba dang po 'khor ba'i gzugs //
T02D1302:207b-37: de bzhin mchog dga' 'khor ba nyid //
T02D1302:207b-38: dga' bral dga' ba 'khor bdag nyid //
T02D1302:207b-39: gsum la lhan cig skyes pa med //
T02D1302:207b-40: dga' ba dang ni mchog dga' nyid //
T02D1302:207b-41: dga' bral dga' ba la sogs pa //
T02D1302:207b-42: gsum pa spangs par gyur na ni //
T02D1302:207b-43: bzhi pa gang las skye bar 'gyur //
T02D1302:207b-44: de bas gsum po thabs byas te //
T02D1302:207b-45: bzhi pa bsgom par bya ba yin //
T02D1302:207b-46: rtsa ba'i rgyu ni gsum du gyis //
T02D1302:207b-47: de yi 'bras bu bzhi pa yin //
T02D1302:207b-48: yang na 'bras bu gsum gyis spangs //
T02D1302:207b-49: yang na rang gis gsum pa yin //
T02D1302:207b-50: dga' ba'i bye brag tu shes bya //
T02D1302:207b-52: zhes rgyud phyi ma las gsungs so //
T02D1302:207b-53: dang po bum pa'i dbang yin te //
T02D1302:207b-54: mchog gi dga' ba gsang ba'i dbang //
T02D1302:208a-2: bzhi pa phyag rgya chen po yin //
T02D1302:208a-3: mnyam par ma bzhag dus su yang //
T02D1302:208a-4: bya ba gang la 'jug pa na //
T02D1302:208a-5: lhan cig skyes las ma gtogs par //
T02D1302:208a-6: gzhan gyi sems kyis mi gnas so //
T02D1302:208a-7: de yang brtag pa bcu drug pa las //
T02D1302:208a-8: bde ba gnag cing bde ba ser //
T02D1302:208a-9: bde ba dmar po bde ba dkar //
T02D1302:208a-10: bde ba ljang gu bde ba sngo //
T02D1302:208a-11: bde ba rgyu dang mi rgyu gan //
T02D1302:208a-12: bde ba thabs dang shes rab ste //
T02D1302:208a-13: de bzhin mnyam par gzhag pa ste //
T02D1302:208a-14: bde ba dngos po dngos med bde //
T02D1302:208a-15: rdo rje sems dpa' bde bar brjod //
T02D1302:208a-17: de nas bskyed pa'i rim pa la gnas pas /
T02D1302:208a-18: bar chad thams cad nye bar zhi sor bya ba'i phyir 'byung po thams cad kyi gtor ma ni /
T02D1302:208a-19: srung ba'i 'khor lo rdzogs par byas nas /
T02D1302:208a-20: de'i dbus su chos kyi 'byung gnas bsams la /
T02D1302:208a-21: de'i steng du pam las padma 'dab ma brgyad pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa bsams la /
T02D1302:208a-22: de'i steng du aom las 'khor lo sa bon dang ldan pa las 'od zer 'phros pas /
T02D1302:208a-25: 'dod pa'i lha la sogs pa thams cad 'od zer des sku rdo rje byas nas /
T02D1302:208a-26: der bsdus te gcig tu gyur pa las /
T02D1302:208a-27: sku rdo rje zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa sku mdog
T02D1302:208a-28: dkar po rdo rje dang dril bus shas rab ma
T02D1302:208a-29: la 'khyud pa / phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pa g-yas brkyang bas bzhugs par bsam par bya'o //
T02D1302:208a-30: shes rab ma yang thabs dang 'dra /
T02D1302:208a-31: bar du h'um las rdo rje /
T02D1302:208a-32: de las phyogs skyong thams cad der bsdus nas gcig tu gyur pa las /
T02D1302:208a-33: thugs rdo rje sngon por bsam par bya'o //
T02D1302:208a-34: de'i 'og tu aa las padma des lha ma yin
T02D1302:208a-35: la sogs pa thams cad gsung rdo rje sku mdog
T02D1302:208a-38: de nas ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs la mchod
T02D1302:208a-39: pa la sogs pa byas te gcig tu gyur par
T02D1302:208a-40: bsam par bya'o // de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa spyan drangs nas /
T02D1302:208a-41: byang chub kyi sems kyi dbang bskur nas /
T02D1302:208a-42: sku rdo rje la rnam par snang mdzad kyis /
T02D1302:208a-43: thugs rdo rje la mi bskyod pas /
T02D1302:208a-44: gsung rdo rje snang la mtha' yas kyis dbu brgyan par bsam par bya'o //
T02D1302:208a-45: de nas gtor ma byin gyis brlab par bya ste /
T02D1302:208b-0: de'i @208b steng du ram las me'i dkyil 'khor /
T02D1302:208b-1: der aa las thod pa de'i nang du /
T02D1302:208b-3: de nas bdud rtsir bas ras la /
T02D1302:208b-4: de nyid kyis mtshan par bsam par bya ste /
T02D1302:208b-5: de'i steng du aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de'i
T02D1302:208b-6: dbus su h'um las rdo rje sa bon gyis mtshan
T02D1302:208b-7: par bsams la / de'i stobs kyis bskol la /
T02D1302:208b-8: de'i steng du aam des ye shes kyi bdud rtsi drangs la /
T02D1302:208b-9: gcig tu gyur par bsam par bya'o //
T02D1302:208b-10: de kho na'i snying po gsum gyis byin gyis brlab pa byas nas /
T02D1302:208b-12: aom k'a ya b'a ka tsitta /
T02D1302:208b-26: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharm'a n'am /
T02D1302:208b-28: aom a'a: h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1302:208b-29: 'dis gshegs su gsol bar bya ste /
T02D1302:208b-30: aom khyed kyis sems can don kun mdzad //
T02D1302:208b-31: rjes su mthun pa'i dngos grub gsol //
T02D1302:208b-32: sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas ni //
T02D1302:208b-33: slar yang 'byon par mdzad du gsol //
T02D1302:208b-35: mu:/ kha zas la yang de bzhin du byin gyis brlabs la mchod par bya'o //
T02D1302:208b-36: rnal 'byor gyis ni dva ba gyur na //
T02D1302:208b-37: de nas smon lam gdab par bya //
T02D1302:208b-38: rigs su skye dang dam tshig can //
T02D1302:208b-39: smyo med dgyes pa'i rdo rje dang //
T02D1302:208b-40: bla mar gus shing snying rjer ldan //
T02D1302:208b-41: skye zhing skye bar 'gyur bar shog / lag na rdo rje dril bu 'khrol //
T02D1302:208b-42: zab mo chos ni glog pa dang //
T02D1302:208b-43: btsun mo'i khu ba mnyam zas can //
T02D1302:208b-44: skye zhing skye bar 'gyur bar shog /'dis ni bdag la rjes su dran //
T02D1302:208b-45: snying rje'i spyan ni dmar po la //
T02D1302:208b-46: yan lag nag po byams pa'i thugs //
T02D1302:208b-47: phyag gnyis thabs dang shes rab yin //
T02D1302:208b-48: zhal gcig gnyis med ye shes yin //
T02D1302:208b-49: zhabs gnyis bden pa gnyis su dran //
T02D1302:208b-50: phyag rgya lnga ni sangs rgyas lnga //
T02D1302:208b-51: gdug pa 'dul phyir khro bo yin //
T02D1302:208b-52: sngags pas de ltar mos byas nas //
T02D1302:208b-53: lha yi rnal 'byor pas rgyu bar bya'o //
T02D1302:208b-54: rtag tu brtag par sngags bzlas dang //
T02D1302:208b-55: bsam gtan nyid dang bral mi bya //
T02D1302:208b-56: rtag tu slob ma bsdu bya zhing //
T02D1302:208b-57: rtag tu bshad par bya ba yin //
T02D1302:208b-58: sems can rnams ni rtag bskyang zhing /
T02D1302:208b-59: sangs rgyas rnams la rtag mchod bya //
T02D1302:208b-60: dzam bha la la chu sbyin dang //
T02D1302:208b-61: las rnams thams cad rab tu spyad //
T02D1302:208b-62: mchod rten las ni bye ma las //
T02D1302:209a-1: pas cho ga bzhin du bya //
T02D1302:209a-2: sgrub thabs rtsom dang mi ldan yang //
T02D1302:209a-3: bla ma du ma'i man ngag bzhin //
T02D1302:209a-4: sgrub thabs byas las 'gal ba gang //
T02D1302:209a-5: de nyid mkhyen pas bzod pa mdzod //
T02D1302:209a-6: tha ma 'bring dang rab don du //
T02D1302:209a-7: rim pa gsum ldan byas pa las //
T02D1302:209a-8: dge ba dri med thob pa nges //
T02D1302:209a-9: de nyid rin chen rab gsal shog / dgyes pa'i rdo rje lhan cig skyes pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs //
